title: Rounded, Condensed version of Eurostile Style Font
content:
Received this from a client, and by golly I've tried everything. Whatthefont, Identifont, DaFont, looked through a million fonts like Eurostile. It's like a mix of Ando and Trump Gothic – with Eurostile. But with rounded caps and ultracondensed. The pincher is that I swear I have it and have used it before. Hoping someone will look at it and say "It's \_\_\_\_\_\_ Dummy, you know this."

[RefrigeratorDeluxe is close](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054852/http:/fontdeck.com/typeface/refrigeratordeluxe)

Font: 

 Arvil 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054852/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

comments.content:
Closest matches I've found:

[Dharma Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054852/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/dharma-gothic/)  
 [Raleigh Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054852/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/grouptype/raleigh-gothic/) This is nearly it! Just doesn't have the rounded end caps, and the R is wrong.
